extends GameObject

    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(int x,
                  int y,
                  processing.core.PImage sprite,
                  int dir)
        Constructor method for Projectile. Sets default values for velocity, direction and status attributes.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate on window
        y - y-coordinate on window
        sprite - image of Projectile
        dir - direction of Projectile movement, same as movement direction of Character that shot it (0 for left, 1 for right, 2 for up, 3 for down)

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws Projectile on window
        Parameters:
        app - PApplet app to draw Projectile on

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(int row,
                              int column)
        Checks if object with coordinates given will collide with Projectile depending on its movement direction
        Parameters:
        row - row number of object to be checked
        column - column number of object to be checked
        Returns:
        true if collision occurs, false if not

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves the Projectile on the window according to chosen direction. Prevents Projectile from moving off screen.
